definition: to wash away/to eliminate/to do away with
to get rid of/to remove/to exclude/to eliminate/to wipe out/to divide/except/not including

sentences.english: The fourth problem is whether to keep elimination regulation.
sentences.chinese: 第四個問題是滌除權制度取捨。

sentences.english: It is worthy discussing on aesthetical connotation of Lao Tzus the golden mean and elimination.
sentences.chinese: 老子守中論和滌除論的審美內涵和意義值得探討。

sentences.english: He has nothing embraced or rejected, has sloughed off every view right here — every one.
sentences.chinese: 因爲他即不接受，也不拒絕，在這世上滌除一切觀點。
